title: The configuration for a archiver handler
description: Defines the settings for a trigger handler that archives/cleans inputs.

enabled.description: Enables the archiver handler on this trigger. Default is true.

timeToKeep.description: milliseconds to keep file before archiving. Default 60000.

semiMatchedArchiveEnabled.description: should we archive images blocked by masks into semidetached folder ?. Default is false.
